item.title: Helpful Shiny apps
item.description: If you are an R user but donâ€™t know yet what Shiny and Shiny apps are, you definitely should read up on it on https://shiny.rstudio.com. But in a nutshell, Shiny is an R package that builds interactive web apps straight from R. You just need to write an R script that follows a specific Shiny syntax and once you run the script, the package builds a HTML file as user interface (UI) with interactive input elements (based on Javascript) that trigger certain computations in R.
